item.title: BARRETT: Losses on and off-field leave Lions on the brink
item.description: Brisbane is asking itself the hard questions after a horror 0-3 start to 2024, writes Damian Barrett

item.title: Another blow for Swans as defender suffers injury setback
item.description: Dane Rampe was subbed out of the game against Richmond with hamstring tightness, with scans confirming the extent of the injury

item.title: Lowly Eagles hope to learn to fly on extended trip
item.description: West Coast is using an extended stay in Melbourne ahead of Gather Round as a chance for player bonding as it copes with a poor start to the season

item.description: The AFL admits the umpires missed some of the free kicks that should have been paid to Jack Ginnivan

item.title: Nicks accepts growing criticism as Crows dealt fresh injury blow

item.title: 'I'm worried': The biggest concern about West Coast's horror start

item.title: Power mid edges closer to return, 'valuable lessons' learned from loss
item.description: Jason Horne-Francis trained strongly as he pushes to return from a hamstring injury in time for Port Adelaide's clash with Essendon on Friday night
